name: CreativeNewMexicoBlogReader
0:
”Alexa Ask Creative New Mexico to Read Recent Posts”
”Alexa Ask Creative New Mexico to Search for Santa Fe”
”Alexa Open Creative New Mexico”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: creative new mexico
des: This skill helps you find out about the arts in New Mexico. You can use it to listen to recent posts on the Creative New Mexico blog, or you can search for posts mentioning New Mexico cities and towns.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
